thread.title: British Airways flight from London skids off runway during landing at Billung Airport in Denmark in icy conditions
thread.title_full: British Airways flight from London skids off runway during landing at Billung Airport in Denmark in icy conditions

author: Neal Baker
title: British Airways flight from London skids off runway during landing at Billung Airport in Denmark in icy conditions
text:
Opinion PLANE SLIDE SHOCK British Airways flight from London skids off runway during landing at Billung Airport in Denmark in icy conditions By NEAL BAKER A BRITISH Airways plane has dramatically skidded off a runway during landing in icy conditions. 
BA flight A319 from London slid off the tarmac at Billung Airport in Denmark. 
No injuries have been reported. 
A BA spokesperson told The Sun that a “technical issue” was behind the near-disaster on the 07:35 flight which landed at 09:06 local time on Tuesday morning. The guy in the jacket is like "how are we going to get this plane out this ditch?!" #britishairways #billund pic.twitter.com/nhui53koPf 
For the latest news on this story keep checking back at Sun Online, where we will bring you live updates as soon as they happen, before anyone else. 

Like us on Facebook at www.facebook.com/thesun , and follow us from our main Twitter account at @TheSun , where we will bring you this story and all the rest of the top news and exclusives of the day.
